actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the deepening of the Arkansas Post Canal of the McClellan-Kerr Arkansas River Navigation System, Arkansas.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Army to proceed to deepen the Arkansas Post Canal of the McClellan-Kerr Arkansas Navigation River System. Appropriates such funds as are necessary to complete the project.

titles.title: A bill to require the deepening of the Arkansas Post Canal of the McClellan-Kerr Arkansas River Navigation System, Arkansas.
